name: Commandline-Hero
tagline: Rule your commandline tools on every device
body:
### Welcome to Commandline-Hero

This project makes all your tiny commandline tools on your desktop-pc available over http via a browser-interface or directly over a JSON interface.
The primary goals are:
* Make your commandline tools available on mobile devices or any oher device with a web-browser without any programing effort
* Use JSON to make your commandline tools available in other distributed applications.

### Getting started
1. Installed Prerequisites
 * Eclipse
 * Maven
2. Install Commandline-Hero via [Eclipse Marketplace](http://marketplace.eclipse.org/) or Update Site `http://richclient2.de/cmd`
3. Follow the [QuickStart Guide](https://github.com/tmseidel/commandline-hero/wiki/QuickStart)
4. Optional: Build your own apps using Commandline-Hero, see the [JSON-Guide](https://github.com/tmseidel/commandline-hero/wiki/JSON-QuickStart)
